entities.name: hagrid

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is mentioned as having a face that appeared at Hagrid's window and is supposed to listen to the official notice of execution.

entities.name: hermione

relationships.description: Macnair is supposed to listen to the official notice of execution as per procedure, indicating that Hagrid is supervising Macnair.
Fudge gives instructions to Hagrid regarding the official notice of execution and signing it.
Fudge also gives instructions to Macnair regarding listening to the official notice of execution.
Harry is trying to rescue Buckbeak by untying it from the fence.
